name: df-zrh
body: |- wceq(czrh, cmpt(s0, universe, cuni(co(zring, crh, cv(s0)))))
comment: Define the unique homomorphism from the integers into a ring. This encodes the usual notation of ` n = 1r + 1r + ... + 1r ` for integers (see also ~ df-mulg ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jun-2015.) (Revised by AV, 12-Jun-2019.)
